item.title: Some math notes
item.description:
\( 	ext{A system of } m 	ext{ equations in } n 	ext{ variables:}
ewline a_{1,1}x_1 + a_{1,2}x_2 + … + a_{1,n}x_n = b_1
ewline a_{2,1}x_1 + a_{2,2}x_2 + … + a_{2,n}x_n = b_2
ewline \vdots
ewline a_{m,1}x_1 + a_{m,2}x_2 + … + a_{m,n}x_n = b_m \)
